introduction.section1: Phnom Penh is the capital of Cambodia, a modern city with many cultural monuments.
introduction.section2: Its sumptuous and shining royal palace will dazzle you with its golden roof. Discover the sublime national museum and the overwhelming history of Cambodia with its former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime, which will make you discover the country differently.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Phnom Penh
meta-description: Phnom Penh is a modern city with many cultural monuments. Its sumptuous royal palace, its sublime national museum, and so many more. Besides, discover the overwhelming history of Cambodia with its former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime. Through our articles, discover different places to visit. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
social-network-description: Phnom Penh is a modern city with many cultural monuments. Its sumptuous royal palace, its sublime national museum, and so many more. Besides, discover the overwhelming history of Cambodia with its former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime.
